{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = N600 Dual Band Wi-Fi USB 2.0 Adapter |caption2 = |pp = http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-adapters/WNDA3100.aspx |sp = https://www.netgear.com/support/product/WNDA3100v3 |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Netgear |model = WNDA3100 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = v3 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = January 31, 2015 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Netgear_WNDA3100v3 |sernum = |wlclass = AN600 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle |vendor_id = 0846 |device_id = 9014 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = PY314400296 |icid = 4054A-14400296 |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = MediaTek;MT7632U; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Delta Networks |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = DFS, |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 11/11/2014 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B001498LIO |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "2976466002" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *[http://forums.gentoo.org/viewtopic-t-1006508.html On the '''Gentoo''' forums] :0846:9014 USB ID *[https://github.com/jurobystricky/Netgear-A6210 Working Linux driver] ('''mt7662u_sta''') [http://askubuntu.com/questions/740227/how-to-install-wifi AU]
